manifest.name: react-display-name
manifest.description: utility to return a react components display name

scripts.build:lib: mkdirp lib && babel src -d lib && cpy src/*.d.ts lib
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run build:lib && npm run build:spec
